gamemodeoverhaul.configgui.enablegmcomma: Set this to false if you don't want the mod to add the '/gm' command
gamemodeoverhaul.configgui.enablereallys: Set this to false if you don't the mod to add '/gmc', '/gms', '/gmsp' and '/gma'
gamemodeoverhaul.configgui.enabledgmcomm: Set this to false if you don't want the mod to add the '/dgm' command
gamemodeoverhaul.configgui.enablewelcome: Set this to false if you don't want the welcome message
gamemodeoverhaul.configgui.enabledebugme: Set this to true if you want GamemodeOverhaul to log debug messages
